resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
When trying to build for device I get:

[ERROR] :  Unable to find an iOS Developer Certificate for "Mads MÃ¸ller (GT25Z3J378)"
    Mads Christensen (TB27M6T468)
    Mads Møller (GT25Z3J378)
Did you mean this?
    Mads Møller (GT25Z3J378)


As you see, my name is Mads Møller and not Mads MÃ¸ller, so Studio cannot detect it.
fields.summary: Studio: Cannot find developer profile with UTF8 characters

comments.body: Resolving this as a duplicate of TISTUD-6279. Please follow TISTUD-6279 for latest updates.
